attributes.action: Nigel F thought he rep. our UK and our Queen at the EU Mtg .that`s not our view.
attributes.background:
He was so wrong. 

As a law biding citizen living in the United Kingdom I feel raped. 

People were misled and we must have a second referendum.

We must respect our Sir Richard Branson`s views . He is so right and will always do wonders for our country.

rejection.details:
It's not clear what action you want the UK Government or Parliament to take. 

If you want a second referendum on the EU, we already have a petition open about that: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133753
